name: Christopher Rockensies
title: Excel Tool for Efficient YTD Expense Reporting

cleaned.what_built: I developed a year-to-date ledger summarization tool using ChatGPT, which streamlines our monthly reporting process for actual expenses. The tool integrates queries and macros in Excel, allowing for quick updates and easy access for the team. It summarizes YTD expenses by vendor and account group, significantly reducing the time spent on reporting.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: Previously, our team spent several days each month manually downloading and formatting reports from the ledger system, which was time-consuming and prone to errors. This clunky process limited our ability to update all expense categories efficiently. The manual nature of the task made it challenging to produce timely and accurate reports for budgeting and forecasting.
cleaned.outcome: Now, I can refresh all pivot tables and queries in under 10 minutes, providing a comprehensive summary of account groups by vendor and segment. This tool saves us one to two days of work each month and consolidates all account groupings into a single file, enhancing our ability to analyze expenses and update forecasts.
cleaned.cross_team_use: Any team involved in financial reporting or forecasting can benefit from this tool, as it simplifies the process of pulling general ledger details into a reportable format. It eliminates the need for individual account ledger downloads and formatting, making reporting more efficient.
cleaned.surprise: I was surprised by the speed and ease of building queries once I grasped the basics. I plan to implement this approach in other areas of my work and integrate it into my monthly forecasting files.

name: Daniel Kates
title: Outlook Email Automation for Securitization Management

cleaned.what_built: I developed a Python automation script that integrates with Microsoft Outlook to streamline the handling of securitization emails. It identifies messages from specific senders, extracts securitization names, organizes files in the Capital Markets database, and saves attachments while avoiding duplicates. The script runs daily after market close, improving operational efficiency for the Capital Markets team.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: The Capital Markets team receives numerous emails daily, risking the oversight of important materials. Duplicate notifications can lead to confusion and wasted time, while manual handling disrupts productivity. Automating the process ensures nothing is missed, prevents duplication, and enforces standard file organization.
cleaned.outcome: The automation saves 5–10 minutes per analyst daily, increasing productivity and allowing focus on higher-value analysis. It creates consistency in file storage, ensuring a reliable archive and boosting analysts' confidence in managing securitization materials. This enhances operational quality and supports faster decision-making.
cleaned.cross_team_use: The principles of automation apply across teams handling repetitive tasks like filing emails or organizing documents. Similar logic can be used in various workflows, allowing employees to focus on analysis and client relationships, where human judgment adds the most value.
cleaned.surprise: I was surprised by how effectively AI could debug and enhance my ideas, generating useful outputs from rough drafts or pseudocode. This made the development process seamless.

name: Daniel Kates
title: Automating SFR Deal Annexes with ChatGPT

cleaned.what_built: We developed a workflow using ChatGPT to standardize SFR deal annexes by automatically identifying and extracting key fields, regardless of their labeling or column order. This process replaces a manual, error-prone method with a clean, comparable dataset that is ready for decision-making in a fraction of the time.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: The workflow addresses the inconsistency and manual effort involved in processing SFR deal annexes, which often contain thousands of rows with varying column formats. Analysts previously spent significant time locating key information and rebuilding calculations, leading to errors and inefficiencies.
cleaned.outcome: The implementation has significantly improved efficiency, reducing manual effort by 80–90% and allowing tasks that took hours to be completed in minutes. Analysts now receive fully standardized datasets with calculated performance metrics, enhancing clarity and speeding up decision-making.
cleaned.cross_team_use: This scalable approach can be applied across other teams at Starwood facing similar challenges with inconsistent data formats in large Excel files. It can support various asset classes and functions, enabling teams to extract and standardize critical data efficiently.
cleaned.surprise: We were surprised by the workflow's ability to effectively normalize inconsistent formats and deliver reliable outputs. The ease of extending the process with new calculations exceeded our expectations, demonstrating its flexibility and reliability.

name: Michael Warrenger
title: Bullet Point Generator for Debt RFPs

cleaned.what_built: A Custom GPT called 'Repo Bullets Generator' for the European Debt Origination Team that generates concise bullet points summarizing debt RFPs for Capital Markets. It follows a structured workflow to extract key financing facts and rewrite them into digestible bullets, adhering to specific guidelines for consistency and clarity.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: The Custom GPT addresses challenges of speed, consistency, and accuracy in preparing repo bullets. It reduces preparation time from 45-60 minutes to as little as 5 minutes and ensures uniformity in format and detail across team members.
cleaned.outcome: The tool unlocks capacity for higher-value work, enhances scalability, and aids in training new team members. It also establishes a reference catalog of comparable bullets and accelerates the creation of long-form materials like IC memos.
cleaned.cross_team_use: Currently, the Custom GPT is primarily useful for Debt Origination and Capital Markets, but its principles could benefit various Starwood departments. Similar processes in other regions could also leverage this tool.
cleaned.surprise: I was surprised by the flexibility of the Custom GPT after the firmwide teach-in on August 7th. The training process took about two hours and has already saved significant time for the team.

name: Rhonda Chan
title: Standardized Repo Deal Email Drafting GPT

cleaned.what_built: I built a custom GPT called 'Repo Deal Email Assistant' that transforms internal deal memos into standardized cover emails for repo counterparties. It follows a specific structure to ensure consistency and clarity in communication.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: This GPT solves the inconsistency and time-consuming process of preparing deal summaries for external communication. It standardizes the output, ensuring accuracy and reducing the workload for the capital markets team.
cleaned.outcome: The implementation cut email drafting time from 20–30 minutes to under 5 minutes per deal. It enhanced clarity and consistency in communications, receiving positive internal feedback for its ease of use.
cleaned.cross_team_use: Yes, this approach can be adapted for any team that shares deal summaries externally. It can also be customized for investor relations, asset management updates, or board reporting.
cleaned.surprise: The GPT's ability to adapt to nuanced institutional language and tone with minimal training was surprising. It maintained the intent of the memos while enhancing clarity, a skill that usually takes months for team members to develop.

name: Alexandra Roberts
title: Streamlining NDA Processing with ChatGPT Prompts

cleaned.outcome: Increased efficiency in redlining NDAs, saving about an hour per NDA and boosting productivity.
cleaned.cross_team_use: This could benefit other departments handling repetitive forms with minor changes.
cleaned.surprise: ChatGPT's responsiveness to feedback and ability to adjust formatting issues.

cleaned.what_built: I created a custom GPT using GPT-5 with Anaplan documentation as its knowledge base. It assists in troubleshooting formulas and provides corrections, as well as tracing calculations.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: The model quickly generates grids for similar formulas with different line item identifiers. It identifies dimension mismatches in Anaplan models and guides users on how to resolve them. It also aids AM and PM team members without Anaplan training in writing and understanding formulas.
cleaned.outcome: The model significantly saves time and aids in generating formula ideas. It also helps recall obscure Anaplan functions when specific tasks arise.
cleaned.cross_team_use: Yes, this model can assist AMs and PMs in using Anaplan without needing extensive backend knowledge, reducing reliance on Anaplan Analysts for minor adjustments.

name: Cameron Pearson
title: Automated Excel Rollups with ChatGPT VBA Codes

cleaned.what_built: Developed VBA codes using ChatGPT to automate manual Excel processes, enhancing efficiency.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: Automated the time-consuming task of creating financial rollups for over 200 properties, which previously required extensive manual effort.
cleaned.outcome: The automation has significantly saved time and improved productivity, allowing simultaneous work on other tasks while the codes run.
cleaned.cross_team_use: The VBA automation can benefit anyone using Excel for property analysis or repetitive tasks, enabling them to streamline their processes.
cleaned.surprise: I was pleasantly surprised by the effectiveness of the codes generated by ChatGPT, which exceeded my expectations and improved with my prompting skills.

name: Daniel Kates
title: Outlook Email Automation for Securitization Management

cleaned.what_built: I developed a Python automation script that integrates with Microsoft Outlook to streamline the handling of securitization emails. It identifies messages from specific senders, extracts the securitization name, organizes files in the Capital Markets database, and saves attachments while avoiding duplicates. The script runs daily after market close, improving operational efficiency and accuracy.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: The Capital Markets team receives numerous emails daily, risking the oversight of important securitization materials. Duplicate notifications led to confusion and wasted time, while manual handling disrupted productivity. Automating the process ensures nothing is missed, prevents duplication, and enforces standard file organization.
cleaned.outcome: The automation saves approximately 5–10 minutes per analyst daily and eliminates distractions from manual processing, enhancing productivity and focus on higher-value analysis. It creates consistency in file storage and boosts confidence among analysts, strengthening operational quality and supporting faster decision-making.
cleaned.cross_team_use: Many teams at Starwood face repetitive tasks that can benefit from automation using Python scripts or AI tools. This approach can be adapted to various workflows, reducing low-value work and allowing employees to concentrate on analysis and strategic decision-making.
cleaned.surprise: I was surprised by how effectively ChatGPT transformed rough code into a functional script, making debugging efficient. The script's flexibility to run on different mailboxes, while designed for my VP’s account, highlighted AI's potential to enhance learning and execution in a business context.

name: Kieran Hagan
title: DDQ GPT Development for SREIT Onboarding Enhancement

cleaned.what_built: I developed a custom GPT named DDQ GPT and created a prompt to streamline the onboarding process, enhancing my effectiveness in my role.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: This GPT and prompt helped me quickly gain proficiency in delivering information about SREIT, significantly reducing the time needed to understand the vehicle and the competitive landscape.
cleaned.outcome: The workflows led to a deeper understanding of SREIT and its competitors, saving time for both me and my supervisor, enabling me to focus on impactful projects.
cleaned.cross_team_use: This workflow could benefit other client-facing teams, including Sales, Investor Relations, Marketing, and Operations.
cleaned.surprise: I was impressed by DDQ GPT's ability to dynamically interpret and respond to complex questions about the prospectus, rather than just providing copied text.

name: Natasha Barker
title: AI Integration for EA Assignments and Fund Database

cleaned.what_built: Implemented two AI solutions: 1) Added EA assignments to the intranet directory. 2) Created a searchable space for deals and fund splits to assist with expense allocations.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: Assistants struggle to identify EA contacts, often asking multiple people for information. Additionally, not all deals are in the Concur system, leading to manual fund split allocations and potential errors in reimbursements.
cleaned.outcome: These tools will save EA time, improve clarity on support, expedite accurate expense reimbursements, and allow EAs to focus on larger projects.
cleaned.cross_team_use: These AI tools will benefit the entire business by ensuring accurate expense reports and providing a quick way to find EAs.

cleaned.what_built: A custom Yardi export report was developed to send data to Blackline, streamlining the accounting control and month-end close process.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: The new report was created quickly using a simple prompt on an existing SQL script, eliminating the need for costly communication with external developers.
cleaned.outcome: The use of powerful SQL syntax generation and natural language prompts allowed for rapid report modification, leading to significant time and cost savings in custom reporting.
cleaned.cross_team_use: This case serves as a model for any team seeking application enhancements, demonstrating how to effectively extract inputs and achieve desired outputs.
cleaned.surprise: I was impressed by the ease with which complex SQL scripts were understood and processed.

name: William Kanders
title: Automated Email Tracker for Team Project Management

cleaned.what_built: I created a Microsoft Power Automate Template that sends a daily email at 6:30 AM to my team, containing a color-coded table of ongoing projects. The table includes project names, statuses, due dates, and additional notes, with a linked Excel tracker for updates via SharePoint.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: The tracker addresses the challenge of coordinating projects across different time zones, ensuring timely deliverables and enhancing visibility for senior team members. It has minimized communication bottlenecks and shortened weekly meetings.
cleaned.outcome: The tool has become essential for our team, facilitating daily updates on projects and due dates. It has saved 1 to 2 hours per week in meeting preparation and discussions, making our workflow more dynamic and productive.
cleaned.cross_team_use: This tool could benefit all teams in the organization by providing a structured way to track projects and communicate updates. The daily email keeps everyone informed about outstanding tasks and priorities.
cleaned.surprise: I was surprised by how easily Chat GPT assisted me in coding the necessary HTML, despite my lack of a Computer Science background. It also provided valuable suggestions to enhance my initial idea.

name: Sarah Connolly
title: Automated Candidate Evaluation with Custom Scorecards

cleaned.what_built: I built a Talent Match Studio that allows recruiters to input job descriptions and customize the importance of each requirement by percentage. It generates a scorecard to evaluate candidates based on fit and enables recruiters to download PDF summaries for hiring managers. The workflow also incorporates employee feedback to update candidate rankings.
cleaned.challenge_addressed: This solution reduces manual effort in candidate evaluation, maintains an ordered list of candidates, and provides hiring managers with instant access to up-to-date information.
cleaned.outcome: Using ChatGPT's chat section has significantly streamlined the process, saving time and allowing for more frequent updates to hiring managers. The workflow will evolve into a Starwood-specific model that can be duplicated for various roles, creating a library of ready-to-use models.
cleaned.cross_team_use: While primarily for HR, the reports and outcomes can benefit all teams by aiding in the recruitment of top talent. The baseline model can be customized for new roles, creating a library of models for recruiters.
cleaned.surprise: I was surprised by how well the model adapted to my modifications. The updates were applied accurately as I shared candidates, demonstrating the model's responsiveness.

name: Marvin Saint-Fleur
title: Time-Saving App for Associate Workflow Optimization

cleaned.challenge_addressed: It helps associates save time for other tasks.
